channel.title: How do i change a server client to a certain ip?
channel.description:
Ok i know i am a noob
But how do i change a server client to a certain ip? It says username..password...then no ip slot.

item.title: How do i change a server client to a certain ip?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

What client are you using? If something like Bluurr’s, it’s in GUI.java titled “serverip”. If something old, it’s in client.java. Anything else, I’m not sure.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change a server client to a certain ip?

item.title: How do i change a server client to a certain ip?
item.dc:creator: @Bigbutterballs Bigbutterballs
item.description:
@Bigbutterballs wrote:

is there a easier way? I don’t have a Egui but i have a GUI folder…i went all threw it and never found a i.p.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change a server client to a certain ip?

item.title: How do i change a server client to a certain ip?
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Go to your client files. Then scroll down and find a file named EGUI. Once you find it (if you have it) you should see either a server ip, 127.0.0.1, or nothing between the commas. If you can find them delete what is in them and add you server ip or the ip you want.

Read full topic
